Class Raytracer.Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      • Raytracer.Light
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Raytracer.Tweakable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Raytracer.DirectionalLight, Raytracer.PointLight
    Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    abstract class Raytracer.Light
extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable
implements Raytracer.Tweakable
    Represents a generic light source that can illuminate scene objects.
